markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guarded Movement](/Feats.aspx?ID=446) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 160 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178) (Level 6)

</column>

---

Your guard is up, even while moving. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by your movement.
name: Guarded Movement
